gameDetails.name: Codenames: Pictures – 5x5 Promo Tiles
gameDetails.description: Codenames: Pictures – Promo Tiles is a set of five tiles (two agents and three bystanders) that were originally available at Gen Con 2016 when purchasing Codename: Pictures. By adding these tiles to your game along with using the key cards from Codenames, you can play Codename: Pictures with a 5x5 grid instead of the recommended 4x5 grid. These tiles will also be available by other means.
